brief_summary.textblock:
Between the years 1999-2011 70 patients went through a revision of the hip joint(revision
      after not successful Total or Partial Hip Replacement). During the revision the Acetabular
      implant was found to be stable and it was decided not to replace it. The polyethylene insert
      was replaced and was fixated using a cement. Our purpose is to evaluate the physical
      condition  of these patients.

clinical_study.brief_title: Revision of the Hip Joint - Prospective Study

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          1. Patients that underwent a revision of the hip replacement without removing the
             acetabular implant

          2. Insert polyethylene with cement

study_pop.textblock:
Patients that underwent a revision of the hip replacement without removing the acetabular
        implant.

primary_outcome.description: Quality of life as measured by the SF12 questionnaire.

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

secondary_outcome.description: Function as measured by the Haris Hip Score

clinical_study.study_design: Observational Model: Cohort, Time Perspective: Prospective
